about_the_game:
Cat Lines is a minimalist puzzle game where you help a curious kitten explore a 2D grid, passing through every block to complete each level. But be careful: the path requires strategic planning! Each move leaves a line on the visited block, and you can only return along the same path by moving back in the direction of the created line.

Key Features:

  • Strategic challenges and innovative mechanics: Return to previous blocks, master directional and sequential blocks, and use portals to solve each puzzle.

  • Level Creator: Unleash your creativity by designing your own challenges to explore within the game!

  • Progressive difficulty: New mechanics are introduced as you advance, keeping the game interesting and challenging.

  • Minimalist visuals and gameplay: A clean and cozy design, ideal for those seeking a relaxing experience.

  • For cat and puzzle lovers: A perfect blend of logic and cuteness, with an adventurous kitten as the protagonist!

Cat Lines is the ideal game for those who want to relax while challenging their mind in a charming environment. Can you guide the kitten through all the blocks and overcome each challenge?

name: cat lines

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Control a cute kitten that leaves a trail of yarn behind! Solve puzzles by covering all the blocks with the yarn line. A relaxing and challenging game for cat lovers!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal
